recipes.name: Mint Chicken
recipes.description: This is an easy and delicious recipe for chicken in a creamy mint sauce.
steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned on all sides, about 5 minutes.
Add the garlic, ginger, and green chilies and cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly.
Add the mint leaves and cook for another minute.
Stir in the cream and salt, reduce the heat to low, and simmer for 5-7 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened slightly.

recipes.name: Strawberry Spinach Salad
recipes.description: A delicious and refreshing salad with strawberries, spinach, and pecans.
steps: In a large bowl, combine the spinach, strawberries, and pecans.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the oil, vinegar, sugar, and poppy seeds.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.

recipes.name: Roasted Asparagus with Parmesan
recipes.description: This is a simple and delicious recipe for roasted asparagus with Parmesan cheese.
steps: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
Place the asparagus on a baking sheet and drizzle with olive oil.
Season with salt and pepper, and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the asparagus is tender and the cheese is melted and golden brown.

recipes.name: Pasta Primavera
recipes.description: A delicious and colorful pasta dish with fresh vegetables.
steps: Cook the pasta in a large pot of salted boiling water until al dente. Drain and set aside.
Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly.
Add the vegetables and cook for 5-7 minutes, or until tender.
Stir in the cooked pasta and Parmesan cheese, and toss to combine.

recipes.name: Strawberry Rhubarb Crisp
recipes.description: This is a delicious and easy recipe for a sweet and crunchy dessert.
steps: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
In a large bowl, combine the rhubarb, strawberries, sugar, and cornstarch.
In a separate bowl, mix together the flour, oats, brown sugar, and butter until crumbly.
Spread the fruit mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish, and sprinkle the crumb mixture over the top.
Bake for 45-50 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and the fruit is bubbling.

recipes.name: Glazed Carrots
recipes.description: A delicious and easy recipe for glazed carrots.
steps: Place carrots in a large saucepan and cover with water; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Drain.
Combine brown sugar, butter, salt, and black pepper in a large skillet over medium heat. Cook, stirring occasionally, until sugar is dissolved and butter is melted, about 2 minutes.
Add carrots to the skillet and stir until coated with the brown sugar mixture. Cook until carrots are glazed, 5 to 7 minutes. Serve hot.
